newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi * Vincent Pitoscia
== New Features ==
* Added support to chose a market price provider for item prices.
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug with the mineral price fetcher. * Fixed a visual bug when sorting assets by jumps. * Fixed a visual bug in the tooltip when queued skill is of level 5. * Fixed a bug where thread crossing occurred while checking time sync on startup.
== Misc ==
* Added support of CCP's image server CDN. * Removing EVEAddicts as a mineral price feeder as it's out of business. * Several improvements have been done to the codebase to make EVEMon a better application.
